public ref class XmlSiteMapProvider : System::Web::StaticSiteMapProvider, IDisposable
type XmlSiteMapProvider = class inherit StaticSiteMapProvider interface IDisposable

summary.span: The class is derived from the class and is the default site map provider for ASP.NET.

span.span: The class is derived from the class and is the default site map provider for ASP.NET.

summary.span: The class generates site map trees from XML files with the file name extension .sitemap.

span.span: The class generates site map trees from XML files with the file name extension .sitemap.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类从遵循已知的架构的 XML 文件加载站点地图数据。The class loads site map data from an XML file that follows a known schema. 站点地图数据受``标记，并用组成嵌套``标记。The site map data is bounded by `` tags and consists of nested `` tags. 两个约束所规定的和类结构的站点将数据映射：Two constraints are imposed by the and classes on the structure of the site map data: - 只有一个根节点可以存在。Only one root node can exist. - 有关指定 Url，Url 必须是唯一的提供程序作用域内的对象。For objects that specify URLs, the URLs must be unique within the scope of the provider. （对于不指定 Url 的节点，所有键必须都是唯一的。）(For nodes that do not specify URLs, all keys must be unique.) 下面的代码示例演示可与一个 XML 文件的示例。The following code example shows an example of an XML file that can be used with the . ``` ``` 是 ASP.NET 的默认提供程序，它从名为 Web.sitemap 位于 ASP.NET 应用程序的目录结构中的文件读取 XML 数据。The is the default provider for ASP.NET and it reads XML data from a file named Web.sitemap that is located within the directory structure of the ASP.NET application. 默认情况下，Web.sitemap 文件位于应用程序根目录中;但是，如果你想要从其更改的名称或文件的位置加载数据，则可以在 Web.config 文件替代默认配置。By default, the Web.sitemap file is located at the application root; however, if you want to change the name or location of the file from which the loads data, you can override the default configuration in your Web.config file. 您可以通过重写你的 Web.config 文件中的默认配置设置，来定制的行为对于每个 ASP.NET 应用程序，如有必要。By overriding the default configuration settings in your Web.config file, you can tailor the behavior of the for each ASP.NET application, as necessary. 下面的代码示例演示一个示例 Web.config 文件，其中仍然使用，但不同站点映射文件，则使用。The following code example demonstrates an example Web.config file, where the is still used, but a different site map file is used. 因为中的所有提供程序对象必须具有唯一名称，在 Web.config 文件中指定的一个使用默认值之外的名称，但也将设置为默认的提供程序，以便它将使用而不是即中指定的 the 默认 ASP.NET 配置。Because all providers in a object must be named uniquely, the one that is specified in the Web.config file uses a name other than the default but is also set as the default provider so that it will be used instead of the that is specified in the default ASP.NET configuration. > [!NOTE] > 你可以更改站点导航数据文件的名称，但你无法更改其扩展名。You can change the name of the site navigation data file, but you cannot change its extension. 仅从名称中带有文件名称扩展.sitemap 的文件中读取数据。The only reads data from files that are named with the file name extension .sitemap. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks `node`参数添加到内部集合，和它之间创建父/子关系和`parentNode`。The `node` parameter is added to an internal collection, and a parent/child relationship is created between it and `parentNode`. 类，派生自类和默认站点映射提供程序对 ASP.NET、 使用属性对象作为其内部的集合，默认情况下中查找键。The class, derived from the class and the default site map provider for ASP.NET, uses the property of a object as a lookup key in its internal collections, by default. 如果属性设置，它必须是唯一的提供程序作用域内。If the property of the is set, it must be unique within the scope of the provider. 方法尝试检索节点基于其。The method attempts to retrieve nodes based on their . 否则，你可以使用属性，以及相应方法，以检索节点。Otherwise, you can use the property, and the corresponding method, to retrieve nodes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法链接`providerName`到当前的提供程序为当前的提供程序的子项。The method links `providerName` to the current provider as a child of the current provider. 根节点`providerName`作为的子节点添加到当前的提供程序的层次结构`parentNode`。The root node of `providerName` is added to the hierarchy for the current provider as a child node of `parentNode`. 因为父提供程序调用方法`providerName`中, 所述的异常方法可能会引发。Because the parent provider calls the method on `providerName`, the exceptions that are described in the method might be thrown.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类重写继承方法以提供其他状态清理超出基本实现，包括清除其子提供程序跟踪和跟踪机制的属性。The class overrides the inherited method to provide additional state cleanup beyond the basic implementation, including clearing its child provider tracking and the property tracking mechanisms.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象重写方法，以确保如果基的类的实现不为指定的 URL 返回节点，任何链接的子提供程序中搜索的节点。The object overrides the method to ensure that any linked child providers are searched for the node if the implementation of the base class does not return a node for the specified URL. `rawUrl`参数应为绝对虚拟路径或相对于应用程序路径，具体取决于如何在 XML 站点地图数据文件中指定。The `rawUrl` parameter should be either an absolute virtual path or an application-relative path, depending on how it is specified in the XML site map data file. 类和从它派生的类使用的 URL作为类维护的各种集合中的键的对象。The class and classes that are derived from it use the URL of a object as a key in the various collections that the class maintains. 因此，这些 Url 必须是唯一的站点图作用域内。Therefore, these URLs must be unique within the scope of the site map. 如果由立即进行站点地图数据中找不到 URL ，它调用上链接到它通过的每个子提供`provider`其站点地图节点的属性。If the URL is not found within the immediate site map data that is managed by the , it calls the on each child provider that is linked to it through the `provider` attribute of its site map nodes. 方法间接调用方法来检索站点图中的顶级节点。The method indirectly calls the method to retrieve the top-level node in the site map. 因此，有关发生的任何异常时调用，也会发生方法方法。Therefore, any exceptions that occur for the method can also occur when calling the method.

exception.span: A child provider linked to the current site map provider returned a node that is not valid.

span.span: A child provider linked to the current site map provider returned a node that is not valid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类重写方法，以确保任何链接的子提供程序，来搜索该节点，如果基类实现不返回的节点`key`。The class overrides the method to ensure that any linked child providers are searched for the node, if the implementation for the base class does not return a node for `key`. 对象，派生自类和默认站点映射提供程序对 ASP.NET、 使用属性对象作为其内部的集合，默认情况下中查找键。The object, derived from the class and the default site map provider for ASP.NET, uses the property of a object as a lookup key in its internal collections, by default. 如果属性设置，它必须是唯一的提供程序作用域内。If the property of the is set, it must be unique within the scope of the provider. 如果没有指定，则自动生成来跟踪节点。If no is specified, the automatically generates a to track the nodes. 方法可能调用上与当前的提供程序关联的任何子提供程序的方法。The method might call the method on any child providers that are associated with the current provider. 因此中, 所述的异常方法可能会引发。Therefore, the exceptions that are described in the method might be thrown.

value.span: A表示站点图的根节点; 否则为时，如果启用了安全修整并且根节点不是当前用户可访问。

span.span: A that represents the root node of the site map; otherwise, , if security trimming is enabled and the root node is not accessible to the current user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性调用方法来检索站点图中的顶级节点。The property calls the method to retrieve the top-level node in the site map. 因此，有关发生的任何异常访问也会发生方法属性。Therefore, any exceptions that occur for the method can also occur when accessing the property. 和类允许只有一个根站点地图中的对象。The and classes permit only one root object in a site map. 类重写抽象属性并提供一个简单的实现，以跟踪根节点。The class overrides the abstract property and provides a simple implementation to track the root node.
